events.alt: Graduation ceremony with students in gowns on stage
events.description: Graduation ceremony to celebrate students' achievements.
events.politique_remboursement: Refunds available up to 7 days before the event. Eventbrite fees are non-refundable.
events.a_propos: A special occasion to honor students who have successfully completed their academic journey.

events.alt: Main entrance of the campus with visitors during an open house
events.description: Open house day to discover the programs and facilities.
events.a_propos: Come explore our campus and meet our teachers and students to learn more about our programs.

events.alt: Athletes competing on a running track
events.description: Inter-school sports competition with multiple disciplines.
events.a_propos: An event bringing together the best student athletes for an energetic competition full of performance.

events.alt: Science exhibition with students presenting their projects
events.description: Science exhibition showcasing innovative student projects.
events.politique_remboursement: Entrance is free, no refunds applicable.
